description: Designed to go where you want to explore, the Gamma SL Anorak is the result of years of Arc’teryx softshell experience and focus on purity of function. The Fortius™ 1.0 double weave is light, but strong. It resists wind and water, breathes, and offers four-way stretch. A StormHood™ adds protection without impacting peripheral vision, the articulated trim fit elevates freedom of movement, and the minimalist design gives the Gamma exceptional versatility and a distinctively clean aesthetic.
name: Arcteryx Gamma SL Anorak - Mens
